## RepositoryLocalObject type

Abstract base class for the data of repository-local data objects: data objects that reside in a "Repository".

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RepositoryLocalObject = IdentifiableObject & {
    BluePrintInfo?: BlueprintInfo;
    IsPublishedInContext?: boolean;
    Locale?: string;
    LocationInfo?: LocationInfo;
    LockInfo?: LockInfo;
    Metadata?: FieldsValueDictionary;
    MetadataSchema?: Link;
    VersionInfo?: LimitedVersionInfo;
};
```
